languages.text: ...приказал{mf||а} захватить судно любыми способами и отправи{mf|л|ла} вместе со штурмовым отрядом создание истовой веры: {petname}, своего двухголового орла.
...ordered the troops to capture the cruiser at any cost and bolstered the strike force with a resplendent symbol of the faith: {petname}, {mf|his|her} own two-headed eagle.
languages.original_text: ...приказал{mf||а} захватить судно любыми способами и отправи{mf|л|ла} вместе со штурмовым отрядом создание истовой веры: {petname}, своего двухголового орла.

traits.locale_text: ...ordered the troops to capture the cruiser at any cost and bolstered the strike force with a resplendent symbol of the faith: {petname}, {mf|his|her} own two-headed eagle.

languages.text: ……命令部队不惜一切代价夺取那艘巡洋舰。战斗过程中，{mf|他|她}本人的双头生化猎鹰（代号{petname}）也会作为信仰的化身上阵，鼓舞军心。
languages.original_text: ...ordered the troops to capture the cruiser at any cost and bolstered the strike force with a resplendent symbol of the faith: {petname}, {mf|his|her} own two-headed eagle.

traits.locale_text: ……命令部队不惜一切代价夺取那艘巡洋舰。战斗过程中，{mf|他|她}本人的双头生化猎鹰（代号{petname}）也会作为信仰的化身上阵，鼓舞军心。

languages.text: …部隊に何としても巡洋艦を捕獲するよう命じ、信仰の輝かしい象徴である{mf|彼|彼女}の双頭鷲、{petname}を加えて打撃部隊を強化した。
languages.original_text: ...ordered the troops to capture the cruiser at any cost and bolstered the strike force with a resplendent symbol of the faith: {petname}, {mf|his|her} own two-headed eagle.

traits.locale_text: …部隊に何としても巡洋艦を捕獲するよう命じ、信仰の輝かしい象徴である{mf|彼|彼女}の双頭鷲、{petname}を加えて打撃部隊を強化した。

languages.text: ... befahl den Truppen, den Kreuzer um jeden Preis zu erobern, und verstärkte den Einsatzverband mit einem strahlenden Symbol des Glaubens: {petname}, {mf|sein|ihr} eigener zweiköpfiger Adler.
languages.original_text: ...ordered the troops to capture the cruiser at any cost and bolstered the strike force with a resplendent symbol of the faith: {petname}, {mf|his|her} own two-headed eagle.

traits.locale_text: ... befahl den Truppen, den Kreuzer um jeden Preis zu erobern, und verstärkte den Einsatzverband mit einem strahlenden Symbol des Glaubens: {petname}, {mf|sein|ihr} eigener zweiköpfiger Adler.

languages.text: Erlere ne pahasına olursa olsun kruvazörü ele geçirmeleri emrini verdi ve saldırı kuvvetini inancın göz kamaştıran nişanesiyle takviye etti: Çift başlı kartalı {petname}.
languages.original_text: ...ordered the troops to capture the cruiser at any cost and bolstered the strike force with a resplendent symbol of the faith: {petname}, {mf|his|her} own two-headed eagle.

traits.locale_text: Erlere ne pahasına olursa olsun kruvazörü ele geçirmeleri emrini verdi ve saldırı kuvvetini inancın göz kamaştıran nişanesiyle takviye etti: Çift başlı kartalı {petname}.

languages.text: ... ordenó a las tropa capturar el crucero a toda costa y reforzó el equipo de asalto con un símbolo resplandeciente de la fe: {petname}, su propia águila bicéfala.
languages.original_text: ...ordered the troops to capture the cruiser at any cost and bolstered the strike force with a resplendent symbol of the faith: {petname}, {mf|his|her} own two-headed eagle.

traits.locale_text: ... ordenó a las tropa capturar el crucero a toda costa y reforzó el equipo de asalto con un símbolo resplandeciente de la fe: {petname}, su propia águila bicéfala.

languages.text: ... a ordonné aux troupes de prendre le croiseur à tout prix et renforcé le moral de la force d'intervention à l'aide d'un symbole resplendissant de la foi : {petname}, son propre aigle à deux têtes.
languages.original_text: ...ordered the troops to capture the cruiser at any cost and bolstered the strike force with a resplendent symbol of the faith: {petname}, {mf|his|her} own two-headed eagle.
